mapper.select: SELECT c.*, s.name, s.address FROM contract c JOIN space s on c.space_id = s.id WHERE space_id = #{space_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT contract (grouping_id, pexhibition_id, space_id, provider_id, cost) VALUES (#{grouping_id}, #{pexhibition_id}, #{space_id}, #{provider_id}, #{cost})
mapper.update: UPDATE contract SET space_id = #{space_id} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE contract SET provider_id = #{provider_id} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE contract SET cost = #{cost} WHERE id = #{id}
